text: Hoba a fihle ho Josefa chankaneng, a re: “Oho Josefa! Uena ea nang le ‘nete! A k’u re rarollele toro ea likhomo tse supileng tse nonneng, tse jeoang ke tse otileng tse supileng le litsejana tsa koro tse supileng tse talana le tse supileng tse bajuoeng, hore ke tle ke boele ho batho; battle ba tsebe
